name: Midnight Minis Lip Set
about: What it is: A set that includes five Lip Sleeping Masks: Berry, Gummy Bear, Peached Iced Tea, Mango, and Watermelon Pop...Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily..Skincare Concerns: Dryness, Dullness, and Loss of Firmness and Elasticity..Formulation: Balm..Highlighted Ingredients:- Berry Mix Complex: Rich in antioxidants to reveal smooth and supple-looking lips..- Coconut Oil, Shea Butter, and Murumuru Seed Butter: Nourish and deliver lasting moisture..- Vitamin C: Protects from external aggressors...Ingredient Callouts: Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, triclosan, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance. It is also vegan and gluten-free...What Else You Need to Know: The mini masks you manifest every year. Formulated with our Berry Fruit Complex, vitamin C, and coconut oil, these marvelous minis will deliver intense moisture and antioxidants while you sleep...This Set Contains:- 5 x 0.10 oz/ 3 g Lip Sleeping Masks in Berry, Gummy Bear, Mango, Watermelon Pop, Peach Iced Tea..Clinical Results: Lip Sleeping Mask.Based on a 1-week clinical study on 32 women ages 25 to 35:.- 8hours of hydration.- 135% increase in hydration immediately after use..Based on self-assessment survey portion of a 1-week clinical study on 32 women ages 25 to 35, after constant use of product for 1 week:.- 93% agree lips feel softer and look less flaky.- 93% agree lips feel hydrated for a long period of time.- 90% agree lips look healthier
ingredients: -Berry Mix Complex: Rich in antioxidants to reveal smooth and supple-looking lips..-Coconut Oil, Shea Butter, and Murumuru Seed Butter: Nourish and deliver lasting moisture..-Vitamin C: how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Apply generously to the lips in the evening and leave on overnight..-Gently wipe off excess in the morning as needed.

reviews.review_title: I really wanted to love this
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: For me, itu2019s not about the quantity, price or scent of the product u2014 those all check out in my opinion. Itu2019s the fact that this product only provides temporary relief on dry lips. Once it has completely absorbed, I realize that my lips are drier than they were before applying it. I feel like Iu2019m in a never-ending cycle of reapplying these lip masks to undo the dryness itu2019s causing. I really, really wanted to love this product, but if Iu2019m being transparent, I donu2019t. These masks might be more suitable for the warmer seasons u2014 but definitely a no-go for drier seasons.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: They are amazing but dry very quickly after applyed on lips. They were so worth$28

reviews.review_text: I love Laneige, all the scents and the way itu2019s smoothes my lips but the fact thatu2019s itu2019s half the size of the already small containers is ridiculous, paying more something that is already small to begin with then basically getting scammed is terrible

reviews.review_text: I really like this set. You get some limited edition masks, samples, and for a low price. I just think they are definitely skimping out on the amount of product they give. But it would make a great gift and i love my set!

Love this product and its one of the best purchases ive made this year!

Also great results, I have dry skin and eczema so it's hydrating, lasts a while and great scent. Does not irritate buy lips but hydrate instantly. Definitely recommend as a gift, travel or personal use!

reviews.review_text: My auntie got me this as a Christmas present, and I could not be happier. My lips were chapped as heck and after using these for about a month it made a huge difference. These minis are perfect for traveling, they smell AMAZING, and the scooper is so cute! Definetly recommend it for tweens christmas gift.

reviews.review_title: A must have! Healed my lips immediately!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I must say this product is worth the money! I got this for my birthday and it has become a key part of my nightly routine! All of them smell so good! Gummy bear is my personal favorite. This product is perfect to have during the winter or fall. It heals lip extremely well during the dry, arid weather. I would 100% reccomend this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dark skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I originally got gifted one of the single lip masks and got the set to try after I emptied it. I gave one to my mom and later everyone in my family tried it and we all love it! best thing to ever tough our lips. I find personally after using certain lips balms, my skin peels a lot. but with this there's no peeling and my lips stay protected all day. in the summer I really only apply it once a day but in winter, twice due to the cold. definitely recommended. perfect gift set.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I use this lip mask every night before bed and every morning my lips are so soft and most mornings it's still on my lips. All the flavors smell so good! I live in a colder winter climate and my lips are chapped often. Laneige really helps heal my lips.

reviews.review_title: Great product with a great assortment of scents!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Although it appears there is little product in the containers, a little goes a long was with this product! It moisturizers my lips really well. I use before bed and when I wake up! Works great!

I wanted to try the LaNeige lip mask as I have extremely dry, chapped lips to the point where the corners open and it HURTS when I open my mouth, eat, speak as it reopens deeper and bleeds. But I wasn't sure if it was just a viral & over hyped product, or if it was worth for my to spend money on it -coming from a broke university student, it's a BIG factor as I don't have money to waste or to gamble!  I was hesitant between just getting a full size and commit to a scent or try the minis even. In short, I was hesitating between more product or more scents for *almost* the same price since you get less in the minis.  I'm SO glad I got the minis!! I never thought I would like the watermelon (even was convinced I'd hate it) as I usually hate the scent/taste of artificial watermelon. AND YET it's simply incredible and one of my favorite scents ever! They all smell SO good!   Berry: Smells like those sour rainbow candy strips... YUM Gummy bear: Smells like the purple skittles it's just too good I want to eat it! Stronger scent than others Mango: Smells SO so good, exactly like a very ripe and sweet mango!  Watermelon: The BEST watermelon scent there is! It has the strongest scent with gummy bear Peach: It really smells super good and peachy! This scent is the most subtile one in the pack  The product itself is honestly worth the hype. I've been trying SO many things to try and wake up without the painfully dry and flaky lips, even vaseline on top of lip balm wasn't working plus it stained my pillows which... is a no!   But this mask did NOT stain, and I woke up with NO pain, NO flakes, NO crusts, not even a remote feeling of dryness in my lips! I could still feel the product on my lips in the morning, even tho it had all been absorbed I can feel the silkiness! It really is THAT good and 200% worth the price! I paired it with the LaNeige night mask on my skin, and I never woke up with such a beautiful and plump face!!  So go for it, splurge!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_text: Not sure why many are complaining about the size of the products. Each of them is .10 oz (.50 oz total) for $21. A normal size is .70 oz for $24. You're pretty much getting the same amount per dollar. In reality it's a great way for people to try different scents. I love being able to travel with these minis and have a variety to choose from.

reviews.review_text: It has a very pleasant smell. I wore it over night and when I woke up my lips weren't like hydrated or dry. It's a little on the expensive side. I don't really think it's worth it in my opinion.

They include a little applicator in this which is nice to use. However, the packaging is deceiving and the pots are much shallower than expected.

It even comes with samples of other products too, but an 8 year old doesn't need those. ud83dude02 A must get for you or your loved ones who like this brand!

reviews.review_text: I understand the negative reviews, but to be honest, all of the containers added together would be more than the actual product. But other than that, this product is amazing for if u want to try some new scents, and if u just want a few to have. it's also just a mazing product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Donu2019t waste your money on these please!! This is my first time ever trying the Laneige lip mask and to be honest, my Vaseline lip balm does better than this. I learned a lesson thou2026 donu2019t fall for the hype!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: These are NOT minis, these are sample sized and for 21 dollars these are not scented well either. Laniege knew what they were doing with this deceptive packaging. Do better.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I always thought these were over priced and didnu2019t understand the love, but now I do. The masks taste amazing and are great at keeping my lips hydrated. Iu2019m terrible at drinking water but my lips never feel dry since I started using this constantly. Love the array of flavors so that I donu2019t have to commit to just one!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I use this faithfully at night to restore my lips and get them so soft. Love the mini applicator that it comes with. A small amount goes a LONG way. The product smells fantastic. Considering using this as a lip gloss on days, I don't want to use regular lip gloss or stick. Definitely great idea as a stocking suffer for the upcoming holidays.

reviews.review_title: Not a value set, but a variety pack
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I understand the negative reviews. As paying consumers, many of us are used to receiving a value when buying a set. It's common retail practice to see that sets have a higher value. In this case, IT IS deceiving because although the set is $4 less, you get .20 oz. less, too. Unfortunately, this isn't a value set. You get more variety, at the expense of your wallet, and in exchange for  less product. I ordered these and the peppermint set because I sampled and loved the light pink one (Berry maybe); it lasted an entire month! I waited for Rouge Savings days to buy it because I had just purchased the plumping mask. They are tiny. For $21, you'll get .50 of an oz. total; the full size is $25 / .70 oz., so we are, in fact, paying more for less when the math is done. My recommendation is if you have a flavor you love, buy the full size. If you want variety and don't mind paying more for less, go for it. The product is great. It just depends on what your personal needs and preferences are. Considering how long a sample lasted me, I'm keeping 3 minis and stuffing 2 in my grand nieces stockings. You can't complain when something is free, and you can't put a price on smiles and hugs. For true value, get the peppermint set. ud83dude42

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very happy with the purchase. Good opportunity to try different varieties with reasonable price. Currently using gummy bear one and liking it way more than original pink one. Very moisturizing. Happy to use it every night.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love this set obsessed with the peach ice tea lip mask with they were still around. best bang for your buck

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product, it is great for a purse or a small pencil pouch, I personally love the purple (gummy bear) I would rate it a 4/5

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It was a gift, so I'm not sure how the product is, but the packaging was nice.

reviews.review_title: It is a good set to try flavours
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I personally think that this lip mask is overrated, but that does not mean it's bad. It's good, just not worth all the hype it gets. If you want to buy it this is a very nice set to try some flavours. It has 3 limited edition flavours that you can only get in this set, and 2 other flavours that are available that you can try out. My favourite scents are peach iced tea and mango, they smell subtle yet fresh and sweet. It is nice and hydrating but nothing special. Vaseline does the same thing if you're looking for something with a better price. The packaging is a little deceiving however it's no reason to complain as it states how much product is in each one and that is the exact amount you get. (All five have 3 grams in them). This is 4 stars from me because of all the nice flavours for a cheaper price then one full sized. If you're on the fence about whether to get this or one regular one, I would recommend this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought because I have friends that have been recommending it to me and I love this set. These are supper hydrating and the flavors are delicious and smell amazing not to mention how cute they are.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Porcelain skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: BEWARE! if you decide to get this product, the gnomes WILL steal it from you. I know this because they (mainly dopey) have dry lips and need to hydrate them. Overall, they loved the product, but said they wish there was more inside. if you are lucky enough not to have gnomes, please tell me if the product actually works or if dopey is just lying because he likes the flavor

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great lip mask! Kept my lips hydrated all night. I woke up with some product still on.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great value! Half an ounce of product total for 21 bucks. I think their lip mask goes for more than that, and its .34 oz. First time trying this brand. Light scent and flavor not overpowering. I love these lip sets for the holidays. Thick but not like paste. It's definitely a balm as opposed to a gloss. I don't think I'd spend full price for one, but this is a neat set to keep around and use throughout the cooler months.

reviews.review_text: I love this product but it doesnu2019t come with as much product as I would hope, and I still have to use lip balm during the day but it helps my lips not dry out overnight!!! I think itu2019s a really awesome product and itu2019s definitely good for people just starting to use skincare and such!

reviews.review_text: Not sure if I received a default batch but the Mango, Berry and Peaches iced tea have ZERO scent. Defeats the entire purpose of purchasing the sample variety pack...
DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY! I bought these and they arenu2019t worth the $$$ sadly they are so tiny and not worth it. They look way bigger on the web page. I spend over $100 on three items. NEVER AGAIN!

reviews.review_text: I buy this kit every yr. mostly bc I am still a loyal laneige lip mask fan & it's still an OK deal. for now. when I 1st started to purchase this, it was $19. now it's $21. if it goes any higher I will just purchase the minis from the source bc it's no longer a deal. granted u get the new seasonal flavor & the kit lasts me all yr AND I purchase add'l sets as xmas gifts. but @ $4.20 a mini, it is more cost effective to get same sizes at a cheaper rate elsewhere & make my own gift sets. just sayin ud83dude09
